workflow.description: Imports an SSL certificate into the server trust store.

param.name: url
param.description: URL or just host:port for non-HTTPS SSL services:

param.name: ignoreWarnings
param.description: If set to true, the certificate is accepted silently and the certificate is added to the trusted store

workflow-item.name: item0
workflow-item.display-name: Import a certificate from URL with certificate alias

bind.name: url
bind.description: URL or just host:port for non-HTTPS SSL services:

bind.name: ignoreWarnings
bind.description: If set to true, the certificate is accepted silently and the certificate is added to the trusted store

bind.name: certAlias
bind.description: Leave blank to import the certificate with autogenerated alias. If it is provided this workflow will override any existing certificate with that alias.

workflow-item.description: Imports an SSL certificate into the server trust store.

p-param.name: url
p-param.desc: URL or just host:port for non-HTTPS SSL services:

p-param.name: ignoreWarnings
p-param.desc: Will you accept a certificate with warnings? If you select Yes, the certificate is accepted silently and the certificate is added to the trusted store.
